title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama official repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single CLI command and OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; identical API surface to JS client, installable via PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); chat history, model manager, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper around Ollama providing REPL, syntax highlighting, and conversation save/load.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with documents locally.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, model management, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Lightweight multi-agent orchestration layer letting Ollama models call tools and delegate tasks.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, voice chat, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes additional REST endpoints (bulk chat, SSE, auth) over Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and model management; NuGet package.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into guild channels with slash commands and model picker.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models privately.
